Blackstorm::

Blackstorm blushed and thought "Why I'm feeling gulty that he hug 
me..." she pushed him away and sid "Please, I feel... 
uncorfontable... how can I choose a life if I can't remember it..."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        He pulls her close to him and holds her in an embrace for a 
long 
> moment.  While she's still there he whispers in her ear.  "It's 
okay to be 
> afraid.  And it's okay to be confused.  But sooner or later you 
will have to 
> chose between life here and your old life with the Maximals.  Just 
know that 
> no matter what, I'll be there."
